mapper.update: UPDATE WX_SUBSCRIBE_ SET SUBSCRIBE_=#{subscribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUB_ID_=#{pubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_ID_=#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICK_NAME_=#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LANGUAGE_=#{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_=#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_=#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY_=#{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIONID_=#{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBSCRIBE_TIME_=#{subscribeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK_=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID_=#{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAGID_LIST_=#{tagidList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY_=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY_=#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID_=#{id}
